description: The eastbound carriageway is closed between Dobwalls and Liskeard.
title: Serious crash closes A38 in Cornwall
title_page: Serious crash closes A38 in Cornwall - BBC News
maintext:
A serious crash forced the closure of a busy road in Cornwall.
Devon and Cornwall Police said the incident was reported just before midnight on Friday near the Twelvewoods roundabout on the eastbound A38 in Dobwalls.
The force said the crash involved a number of vehicles and the road was closed for several hours on Saturday before it was reopened at about 11:10 GMT.
Anyone who witnessed the crash or has dashcam footage of the incident has been asked to contact police.
